dlw 0.1.0.9005

Download data from datalibweb and save as a pin

Source: R/dlw_get_data.R
dlw_download.Rd

Download data from datalibweb and save as a pin

Usage

dlw_download(
  country_code,
  filename,
  board,
  pin_name,
  format,
  server = NULL,
  ...,
  verbose = getOption("dlw.verbose")
)

Arguments

country_code

character: ISO3 code

filename

character: Name of the file to save/read (required)

board

A pins board object (as returned by dlw_download)

pin_name

The name of the pin (as returned by dlw_download)

format

character: File format to use for pinning data ('qs' [default] or 'parquet')

server

character: in case we have more than one server. default is GMD

...

additional filtering arguments (e.g.,survey_year, survey_acronym, vermast, veralt, collection, module)

verbose

logical: whether to display info

board_type

character: Which pins board to use:'local' (default user-specific) 'folder' (shared network drive or similar).

Value

A list with the board and pin_name used
